p: To compare the ability of HBPG to prevent an infection and to treat an established infection, the efficacy of the typical regimen (IP twice daily for five days) against HSV-2 encephalitis was measured after initiating treatment one, two, and three days after infection. The results, depicted graphically in Figure 1, show that gradual loss of HBPG efficacy occurred, but that substantial protection remained even when treatment began two full days after infection.
